attributes.additional_details: Stop the politicians claiming obscene amounts in expenses and for the ridiculous things they put claims in for. The hard workers of this broken country can't claim extortionate expenses so why should the politicians? They get paid enough in salaries to cover their own expenses. Think of the money it'll save.
attributes.background: The government have today targeted one ofthe most vulnerable groups in society to 'save' money. Well let our politicians do their bit. Let's have all their expenses stopped. It's nothing short of greed.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out more about IPSA here: https://www.theipsa.org.uk/

You may wish to sign this petition calling for a review of MP’s expenses:

Review the system of expenses and allowances for MPs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702821
